name: Tank Attack (BarryFans)
description:
Welcome to TANK ATTACK! It's a 2-player tank battle!

Tank Attack is a 2 player action game that's inspired from a Mario Party 2 minigame, Shell Shocked. Shoot bullets at your foes, compete against a friend or enemy, or an AI if you don't have any friends, and so much more! 

YOU CAN ALSO PLAY IT IN SCRATCH: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/783072523/
